name: Whisper (Backtrace Game Jam)
description:
Whisper is an asymmetrical local multiplayer game with voice commands. (Can be played without a microphone)

Two players must share information between each other in order to solve puzzles.

- Player 1 downloads the game 

- Player 2 downloads the pdf files. Or uses the interactive version (Interactive version was made after the jam)

- Each player can’t see what the other player sees.

- Players can only communicate by talking to each other.

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Look - Mouse

Pick up Objects - Left Click

Equip Book - Tab or Right Click

Use Book - Keyboard type or say "Letter [Letter]"
